1 Day Chiang Dao Soft Adventure

Join us on an easy and beautiful nature trail through the Chiang Dao national park, enjoy the Rainforest and jungles fauna and flora, starting at Chiang Dao Cave, where we will explore the cave and temple grounds. Take a short drive to where we will start our short trek from a Karen Hilltribe village and walking to the Hot Springs where we can soak up the natural minerals in the water and have lunch. After that we will head to the beautiful Sticky Waterfalls, a natural limestone waterfall caused by the build up of minerals on the rock from the underground spring flowing down the rocks making them sticky and easy to climb.

Quick Facts

Price: THB 2,000
Duration: 10 hours
Meal(s): Lunch
Difficulty: All levels
Seasonal: November - February

More Info

Pick Up & Drop Off

Pick up 7.30 am to 8.00 am. Arriving back in Chiang Mai around 17.00 to 17.30.

Included

Transport, Lunch, Water 2l per person, Guide, Park Fees, Shared hotspring

Not Included

Extra snacks or soft drinks, Private Hot Spring, Any costs arising out of unforeseen circumstances like landslides, road blocks, bad weather, etc.

What to Bring

Wear shoes with grip suitable for trekking and climbing, swimsuit for enjoying at the waterfalls.

Please support our mission by booking your trek directly with us on this site or by calling us instead of through a tour agency.

Highlights

  • Explore Chiang Dao Cave and temple grounds
  • Visit Karen Hilltribe village
  • Soak up the natural minerals in hot springs
  • Enjoy the beauty of Sticky Waterfalls

Itinerary:

  • Pick up 7.30 am to 8.00 am
  • Drive takes about 2 hours stopping at a local market along the way to buy supplies and a short bathroom break.
  • We will drive to Chiang Dao Cave, where we will take some time to walk through the cave and temple grounds.
  • We will take a short drive to start our trail from a local Karen Hilltribe Valley to the hot springs, having lunch here and getting a chance to relax in the Springs.
  • Once we are done, we will drive to Sticky waterfalls where we will be spending sometime enjoying the beauty of the natural lime stone waterfall from a spring underground.
  • Arriving back in Chiang Mai around 17.00 to 17.30

Notes:

Easy trip, perfect for families or people who don’t want to hike for hours.
